itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the odds and the over/unders for the upcoming UFC 251 event including Usman vs. Masvidal, Max Holloway vs. Alexander Volkanovski and Thug Rose vs. Andrade, they talk about the possible financial ramifications of no...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the odds and the over/unders for the upcoming UFC 251 event including Usman vs. Masvidal, Max Holloway vs. Alexander Volkanovski and Thug Rose vs. Andrade, they talk about the possible financial ramifications of no college sports for their respective colleges and college towns, they are not surprised by Adrian Wojnarowski’s ugly F-Bomb email to Senator Josh Hawley, and Dan explains why he doesn’t touch coins anymore.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
